--- title: 'Lab-2: Down the R-abbit Hole...' subtitle: 'Welcome ! Introduce Yourself to R, RStudio, and to all of Us!' summary: Welcome ! Introduce Yourself to R, RStudio! date: "2023-01-05" order: 20 format: html: code-summary: Show the Code code-fold: true code-tools: true code-line-numbers: true code-block-border-left: true code-overflow: wrap fig-align: center fig-cap-location: margin fig-width: 5 fig-height: 4 --- ![](featured.jpg) ## Introduction Welcome! Let's start our journey to the Garden of Data Visualization, with this terrific presentation by the great ( and sadly late..) **Hans Rosling**. The best stats you've ever seen by Hans Rosling: `{{% youtube "hVimVzgtD6w" %}}`{=html}
We will run some boiler-plate R code today! Nothing ( almost! ) to code! We will get used to the tools and words of the trade: R, RStudio, installation, packages, libraries.... links: @Installation 00-install_name_plot.Rmd Slides 00-Installation.Rmd
